feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Builder nav updates by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16200
  • Fix TS not liking a missing prop injected by routify by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16446
  • Fix issue with creating new screens with polluted databases by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16443

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.3...3.13.4

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: handle issues with duplicated workspaceapps by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16447

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.4...3.13.5

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Allow skipping migration redirects by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16434
  • Improve migration ux by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16441
  • Check for /embed url when matching workspace apps for routing by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16449

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.5...3.13.6

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Upgrade to dd-trace 5.56.0 by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16450
  • Prune majority of phosphor icons and serve required files as static assets by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16455
  • Make apps list context menus visible again. by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16457
  • Support for viewing Automation logs with branches. by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16445
  • Fix automation error link by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16469
  • Filter down to primary key options by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16470
  • Correctly add new columns to design section tables by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16442
  • Fix for Make connector where body wasn't being parsed correctly by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16472
  • Add Claude Code GitHub Workflow by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16359
  • "On input" actions by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16473
  • Fixes for Automation UI by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16465
  • Typing multiselect field component in client by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16479

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.6...3.13.7

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Fix] Autogenerate screens from data by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16484

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.7...3.13.8
